mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnslt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_SN , CSTMR_CLM_CD , CNSLT_REQST_MBR_NO , CSTMRNM , CNSLT_KND_CD , INQ_TP_CD , CNSLT_STAT_CD , CNSLT_PRCS_COMPT_DT , CSTMR_EMAIL , CSTMRTEL_NATION_NO , CSTMRTEL_AREA_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_NATION_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_AREA_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_TLOF_NO , CSTMRMOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , MTM_INQ_SN , GOD_INQ_SN , CHAT_INQ_SN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoCnslt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_CNSLT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_SN = #{cnsltSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
